ToolResultBlock(tool_use_id='toolu_01DL4A9dC1mXpuR9fqA27oCz', content='{"content":"#!/usr/bin/env python3\\nimport http.server\\nimport socketserver\\nfrom datetime import datetime\\nimport time\\n\\n\\ndef log(msg):\\n    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime(\\"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%f\\")[:-3]\\n    print(f\\"[{timestamp}] {msg}\\", flush=True)\\n\\n\\nPORT = 8080\\n\\n\\nclass Handler(http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler):\\n    def log_message(self, format, *args):\\n        pass\\n\\n    def do_GET(self):\\n        self.send_response(200)\\n        self.send_header(\\"Content-type\\", \\"text/plain\\")\\n        self.end_headers()\\n        self.wfile.write(b\\"API Service v2\\\\n\\")\\n\\n\\ndef main():\\n    log(\\"Starting backup API service\\")\\n\\n    while True:\\n        try:\\n            with socketserver.TCPServer((\\"\\", PORT), Handler) as httpd:\\n                log(f\\"Listening on port {PORT}\\")\\n                httpd.serve_forever()\\n        except OSError as e:\\n            log(f\\"Failed to bind: {e}\\")\\n            log(\\"Retrying in 30 seconds...\\")\\n            time.sleep(30)\\n\\n\\nif __name__ == \\"__main__\\":\\n    main()\\n","path":"/opt/api_service/backup.py","size_bytes":964}', is_error=None)
